definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)

sentences.english: The calculated results of energy gap on alkaline earth mixed halides are reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 對鹼土金屬復鹵化物的能隙進行了計算，結果合理。

sentences.english: Subsurface drain pipe system is a practical and effective solution to the improvement of submerged land and saline land.
sentences.chinese: 暗管排水是改良低溼地和治理鹽鹼土有效的工程措施。

sentences.english: It does not absorb the alkaline-earth metal ions and behave as the polyamine resins.
sentences.chinese: 但不吸附鹼土金屬離子，這和聚多胺樹脂相同。

sentences.english: The crystal structures of alkali-earth metal dihydrogen diphthalates have been measured.
sentences.chinese: 測定了鹼土金屬鄰苯二甲酸氫鹽的晶體結構。

sentences.english: The article discusses the thickening mechanism of unsaturated polyesters with alkaline-earth metallic oxide.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了鹼土金屬氧化物對不飽和聚酯的增稠機理。

sentences.english: Results showed that MDM could obviously improve the physical and chemical properties of the alkali soil.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，MDM可顯著改善草甸鹼土的理化性質。

sentences.english: Ecological effect of peat and weathered coal on alkali-saline soil.
sentences.chinese: 草炭與風化炭改良鹽鹼土的生態效應。

sentences.english: The alkaline-earth metal strontium is the smallest element in abundance for the silver-white soft metal.
sentences.chinese: 鍶是鹼土金屬中丰度最小的元素，爲銀白色軟金屬。

sentences.english: By two alkyl halide with alkali metal or alkaline earth metal polysulfides from condensation.
sentences.chinese: 由二滷代烷與鹼金屬或鹼土金屬的多硫化物縮聚而成。
